did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection includes some information on an International Ladies' Garment Workers' Union Strike in 1937, Berwick, PA
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English and German

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Newton Friedman Papers #6050. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Scrapbook; German Union Youth Home; German.
Bound volume; Labor Movement and Reconstruction, Stuttgart, 1945-1949; German.

did.unittitle: Testimonial dinner for Felix S. Cohen

scopecontent.p: January 17 at the Chinese Lantern, Washington, D.C.
Includes: S. Metzger, Willi Boekenkrueger, Walter Rau, Max Ehrhardt, Weiss, Ludgwig Diefenbach, Charles Tramsen, Else Schlotterer, Wilhelm Schoeneck, Olga Schlotterbeck, Erika Schoenleber.

did.unittitle: "The Development of Organized Handicraft in Baden-Wuerttemberg"
Speeches delivered on behalf of Manpower Division of Office of Military Government (Wurttemberg-Baden) at occassions pertaining to Manpower Division functions
